EmailTemplate.name: 201907_Americas_Event_HOC_TX_MC.201907_Americas_Event_HOC_TX_Email2_MC.Subject L
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Honeywell for the Houston Operators Conference - August 1st
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
BUSINESS & GENERAL AVIATION HOUSTON
OPERATORS
CONFERENCE
INVITATION Dear Customers/Partners,
We are pleased to invite you to the 2019 Honeywell Operators Conference! This is a great chance to meet the Honeywell team and get your questions answered. Sign up now don’t miss the chance spots are limited!
Date: August 1st, 2019 Time: 9:00 am to 4:00 pm Event cost: Free for Honeywell Customers – please feel free to invite your colleagues Venue: Lone Star Museum of Flight 11551 Aerospace Ave., Houston, TX 77034 Phone: (346) 708-2517
Training certificates for 8 hrs. of credit will be issued to attendees.
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2019/january/2019-operator-conferences]]> Learn about Honeywell Solutions
We will highlight Honeywell’s hardware and services, including the latest upgrades, STCs, and mandates Honeywell Support Processes
Overview on Honeywell processes and how to make the system work for you. Honeywell staff will share best practices and are ready to answer your questions. Museum access, each attendee will have access to view some of the most important aircraft in U.S. history. This event is open to all Honeywell customers. Please feel free to share the invitation with your flight department and friends.
We look forward to meeting you in Houston!
Best regards, Your Customer Core Team
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
